it.polito.computervision.gestures

Class GestureManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.computervision.gestures.GestureManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VirtualScreenListener

    public class GestureManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements VirtualScreenListener
    This singleton manages a set of Gestures. Invokes on each Gesture.updateState(Collection,Collection) with the HandData of the current frame. If a Gesture is in state IN_PROGRESS, then only that gesture will be updated, and all the others will be Gesture.reset(). It also fires GestureListener callbacks based on the GestureState a Gesture is in after the update.
    Author:
    giovanni

      • notifyListeners

        private void notifyListeners(java.util.Collection<HandData> hands,
                   Gesture gesture,
                   GestureState oldState)
        Notifies listeners if necessary, based on the GestureState transition that occurred. Live Gestures are notified of all events. Non-live gestures are only notified of gesture completion.
        Parameters:
        hands - The hands the gesture is tracking.
        gesture - The gesture that may be firing the event.
        oldState - The old GestureState the gesture was in.

      • notifyGestureStarted

        Parameters:
        hands - The HandData of the current frame
